Html:
Ok.  I am sure this is covered somewhere but I cannot seem to find it.

I run optimize on my gear.  And lets say my My Chest have a 9spell/8Spirt and 9spell/8hit and my pants have a 23spell and 9spell/8spirit and my Neck has 9spell/8haste.  It wants to switch out Gems.  So the hit gem in the Chest should go into the Neck and the haste gem should goto the chest.  Also, it wants to trade out the 23spell gem in my pants with a 19spell Gem.

Do I have something not checked or is there something happening here that i dont understand?

Thanks,
MR

It's probably trying to get the more important slot bonuses for you. Also, make sure you have all the gems available to you selected in the Gemming templates menu. That's probably why it switched out the 23SP for 19SP.
